description: The note asks the reader to "communicate" with John Stapleford, dated from 1938.
title: Message in a bottle 'returns' to Jersey beach 82 years later
title_page: Message in a bottle 'returns' to Jersey beach 82 years later - BBC News
maintext: People investigating the bottle said that led them to believe the note had originated from the island and they had guessed it was sent by Mr Stapleford, who was curious about whether anyone would find it.
